restaurant.name: Company Name
restaurant.description: A captivating message describing your products.

items.title: Classic Bruschetta
items.description: Fresh tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella on toasted baguette slices. A perfect start to your meal.

items.title: Stuffed Mushrooms
items.description: Button mushrooms filled with seasoned breadcrumbs, herbs, and parmesan cheese.

items.title: Grilled Chicken
items.description: Tender chicken breast grilled to perfection, served with seasonal vegetables and your choice of sauce.

items.title: Beef Tenderloin
items.description: Premium cut beef tenderloin cooked to your preference, accompanied by roasted potatoes and asparagus.

items.title: Salmon Fillet
items.description: Fresh Atlantic salmon fillet with lemon herb butter, served with rice pilaf and steamed broccoli.

items.title: Chocolate Cake
items.description: Rich chocolate layer cake with chocolate ganache frosting and fresh berries.

items.title: Tiramisu
items.description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cream, and cocoa powder.
